item.title: Character Creation
item.description: Get a character sheet Dolmenwood Character Sheet.pdf The sheet can be printed or edited in the pdf. Roll ability scores Roll 3d6 three times.

item.title: Vocations
item.description: Cleric For this campaign your character will start as a cleric of the Pluritine Church.

item.title: Magic
item.description: Decide how many dice you are going to use to cast your spell.

item.title: Playstyle
item.description: Principles Living World Their is no set plot, and the players are free to follow what interests them.

item.title: Combat
item.description: Attacking There are no “to-hit” rolls, only damage rolls. HP represents a character’s ability to fend off harm during the fight.

item.title: Ability Scores
item.description: Modifiers Ability scores add (or subtract) modifiers to damage rolls.

item.title: Armor
item.description: Light Armor e.g. Leather 1 armor Medium Armor e.g. Chain mail 2 armor, 2 Slots Heavy Armor e.g.

item.title: Mechanics
item.description: Checks Roll 1d20 and add your modifier. The DM will tell you if you succeed or not. A roll of a natural 20 can indicate a Critical Success.
